TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HitTestResultCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function HitTestResultCallback(result As HitTestResult) As HitTestResultBehavior

param.name: result
param.span: 值，表示從點擊測試傳回的視覺物件。

span.span: The value that represents a visual object that is returned from a hit test.

summary.span: 表示用來自訂點擊測試的回呼。

span.span: Represents a callback that is used to customize hit testing.

summary.span: WPF 叫用 將點擊的測試交集報告給使用者。

span.span: WPF invokes the to report hit test intersections to the user.

returns.span: ，表示從點擊測試產生的動作。

span.span: A that represents the action resulting from the hit test.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 點擊的測試回呼方法會定義點擊的測試視覺化樹狀結構中的特定視覺物件上識別時，您所執行的動作。The hit test callback method defines the actions that you perform when a hit test is identified on a particular visual object in the visual tree. 您的回呼執行動作之後，應傳回值，決定是否要繼續逐一查看的任何其他視覺物件的視覺化樹狀結構。After you perform the actions, your callback is expected to return a value that determines whether to continue iterating through the visual tree for any other visual objects. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何叫用使用值。The following example shows how to invoke by using a value. 也會定義對應的點擊的測試回呼方法。The corresponding hit test callback method is also defined. [!code-csharp[DrawingVisualSample#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingVisualSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#103)] [!code-vb[DrawingVisualSample#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingVisualSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#103)]
